scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress:open: npm run prettier && npm run prereport && npx cypress open && npm run junit:merge && npm run mochawesome:merge
scripts.cypress:run: npm run prettier && npm run prereport && npx cypress run && npm run junit:merge && npm run mochawesome:merge
